title: Aries

nouns: One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
Aries is one of the constellations of the zodiac.
A constellation of the zodiac supposedly shaped like a ram.
A small zodiacal constellation in the northern hemisphere; between Pisces and Taurus
As standardized by the International Astronomical Union

description: The Aries astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Ram.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the Aries emoji is depicted as a bold, stylized ram with curved horns, rendered in a warm, earthy brown tone with a polished, 3D appearance. Apple's signature realistic lighting accentuates the texture of its fleece and the smooth, rounded edges of its form, giving it a dynamic and spirited feel. This symbol of courage and determination, presented with Apple's characteristic depth, is often used to represent the zodiac sign, a strong will, or a pioneering spirit.
